message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to inform you that we have extended a job offer to you for the position of {{ doc.designation }} at {{ doc.company }}.

To view and accept your offer, please visit your Candidate Portal by following the link provided below:

Job Offer Details:

  • Position: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Offer Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}
  • Expected Date of Joining: {{ doc.custom_expected_date_of_joining }}

We kindly request that you review the offer at your earliest convenience. Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.

We are excited about the possibility of having you join our team and look forward to welcoming you on board.

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
